title: pbe website
body: when trying to signup for the pbe i get the error 500 code

replies.body:
This is an issue we're aware of and are looking into for a solution. Some players have been able to workaround this by using a VPN such as [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost.**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/)

I'm unable to provide an ETA on when you may see a permafix go out for that page, but if you have any other questions, let me know!
